newsitem.title: USA: Microsoft sets alliance with Asia Connect.
newsitem.headline: Microsoft sets alliance with Asia Connect.

text.p: Microsoft Corp and Asia Connect Tuesday announced a broad technology alliance, making Asia Connect the first company in the Asia-Pacific area to license the Microsoft Commercial Internet System.
In a statement, the companies said Asia Connect said it will use the Microsoft BackOffice-based system to run a variety of services.

Malaysia's Asia Connect is an Internet service provider focused on developing Asian-rich content and serving Web- and transaction-based solutions for retail organizations, financial institutions, broadcasters, corporations and government agencies.
